00027 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00028 #include "DNA_listBase.h"
00029 
00030 #include "BLI_math.h"
00031 #include "BLI_array.h"
00032 #include "BLI_smallhash.h"
00033 #include "BLI_scanfill.h"

00035 #include "bmesh.h"
00036 #include "intern/bmesh_private.h"

00038 #include "intern/bmesh_operators_private.h" /* own include */
00039 
00040 #define EDGE_NEW    1
00041 #define FACE_NEW    1
00042 
00043 #define ELE_NEW     1
00044 #define FACE_MARK   2
00045 #define EDGE_MARK   4
00046 
00047 void bmo_triangulate_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00048 {
00049     BMOIter siter;
00050     BMFace *face, **newfaces = NULL;
00051     BLI_array_declare(newfaces);
00052     float (*projectverts)[3] = NULL;
00053     BLI_array_declare(projectverts);
00054     int i;
00055     const int use_beauty = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_beauty");
00056 
00057     for (face = BMO_iter_new(&siter, bm, op, "faces", BM_FACE); face; face = BMO_iter_step(&siter)) {
00058 
00059         BLI_array_empty(projectverts);
00060         BLI_array_empty(newfaces);
00061 
00062         BLI_array_growitems(projectverts, face->len * 3);
00063         BLI_array_growitems(newfaces, face->len);
00064 
00065         BM_face_triangulate(bm, face, projectverts, EDGE_NEW, FACE_NEW, newfaces, use_beauty);
00066 
00067         BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, op, "facemap", face, face);
00068         for (i = 0; newfaces[i]; i++) {
00069             BMO_slot_map_ptr_insert(bm, op, "facemap",
00070                                     newfaces[i], face);
00071 
00072         }
00073     }
00074     
00075     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "edgeout", BM_EDGE, EDGE_NEW);
00076     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "faceout", BM_FACE, FACE_NEW);
00077     
00078     BLI_array_free(projectverts);
00079     BLI_array_free(newfaces);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void bmo_beautify_fill_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00083 {
00084     BMOIter siter;
00085     BMIter iter;
00086     BMFace *f;
00087     BMEdge *e;
00088     int stop = 0;
00089     
00090     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "constrain_edges", BM_EDGE, EDGE_MARK);
00091     
00092     BMO_ITER (f, &siter, bm, op, "faces", BM_FACE) {
00093         if (f->len == 3) {
00094             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_MARK);
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     while (!stop) {
00099         stop = 1;
00100         
00101         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00102             BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4;
00103             
00104             if (!BM_edge_is_manifold(e) || BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00105                 continue;
00106             }
00107 
00108             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e->l->f, FACE_MARK) ||
00109                 !BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e->l->radial_next->f, FACE_MARK))
00110             {
00111                 continue;
00112             }
00113             
00114             v1 = e->l->prev->v;
00115             v2 = e->l->v;
00116             v3 = e->l->radial_next->prev->v;
00117             v4 = e->l->next->v;
00118             
00119             if (is_quad_convex_v3(v1->co, v2->co, v3->co, v4->co)) {
00120                 float len1, len2, len3, len4, len5, len6, opp1, opp2, fac1, fac2;
00121                 /* testing rule:
00122                  * the area divided by the total edge lengths
00123                  */
00124                 len1 = len_v3v3(v1->co, v2->co);
00125                 len2 = len_v3v3(v2->co, v3->co);
00126                 len3 = len_v3v3(v3->co, v4->co);
00127                 len4 = len_v3v3(v4->co, v1->co);
00128                 len5 = len_v3v3(v1->co, v3->co);
00129                 len6 = len_v3v3(v2->co, v4->co);
00130 
00131                 opp1 = area_tri_v3(v1->co, v2->co, v3->co);
00132                 opp2 = area_tri_v3(v1->co, v3->co, v4->co);
00133 
00134                 fac1 = opp1 / (len1 + len2 + len5) + opp2 / (len3 + len4 + len5);
00135 
00136                 opp1 = area_tri_v3(v2->co, v3->co, v4->co);
00137                 opp2 = area_tri_v3(v2->co, v4->co, v1->co);
00138 
00139                 fac2 = opp1 / (len2 + len3 + len6) + opp2 / (len4 + len1 + len6);
00140                 
00141                 if (fac1 > fac2) {
00142                     e = BM_edge_rotate(bm, e, FALSE, BM_EDGEROT_CHECK_EXISTS);
00143                     if (e) {
00144                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_NEW);
00145 
00146                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->l->f, FACE_MARK|ELE_NEW);
00147                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e->l->radial_next->f, FACE_MARK|ELE_NEW);
00148                         stop = 0;
00149                     }
00150                 }
00151             }
00152         }
00153     }
00154     
00155     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "geomout", BM_EDGE|BM_FACE, ELE_NEW);
00156 }
00157 
00158 void bmo_triangle_fill_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00159 {
00160     BMOIter siter;
00161     BMEdge *e;
00162     BMOperator bmop;
00163     ScanFillContext sf_ctx;
00164     /* ScanFillEdge *eed; */ /* UNUSED */
00165     ScanFillVert *eve, *v1, *v2;
00166     ScanFillFace *efa;
00167     SmallHash hash;
00168 
00169     BLI_smallhash_init(&hash);
00170     
00171     BLI_begin_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00172     
00173     BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE) {
00174         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00175         
00176         if (!BLI_smallhash_haskey(&hash, (uintptr_t)e->v1)) {
00177             eve = BLI_addfillvert(&sf_ctx, e->v1->co);
00178             eve->tmp.p = e->v1;
00179             BLI_smallhash_insert(&hash, (uintptr_t)e->v1, eve);
00180         }
00181         
00182         if (!BLI_smallhash_haskey(&hash, (uintptr_t)e->v2)) {
00183             eve = BLI_addfillvert(&sf_ctx, e->v2->co);
00184             eve->tmp.p = e->v2;
00185             BLI_smallhash_insert(&hash, (uintptr_t)e->v2, eve);
00186         }
00187         
00188         v1 = BLI_smallhash_lookup(&hash, (uintptr_t)e->v1);
00189         v2 = BLI_smallhash_lookup(&hash, (uintptr_t)e->v2);
00190         /* eed = */ BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, v1, v2);
00191         /* eed->tmp.p = e; */ /* UNUSED */
00192     }
00193     
00194     BLI_edgefill(&sf_ctx, FALSE);
00195     
00196     for (efa = sf_ctx.fillfacebase.first; efa; efa = efa->next) {
00197         BMFace *f = BM_face_create_quad_tri(bm,
00198                                             efa->v1->tmp.p, efa->v2->tmp.p, efa->v3->tmp.p, NULL,
00199                                             NULL, TRUE);
00200         BMLoop *l;
00201         BMIter liter;
00202         
00203         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, ELE_NEW);
00204         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00205             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00206                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, l->e, ELE_NEW);
00207             }
00208         }
00209     }
00210     
00211     BLI_end_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00212     BLI_smallhash_release(&hash);
00213     
00214     /* clean up fill */
00215     BMO_op_initf(bm, &bmop, "beautify_fill faces=%ff constrain_edges=%fe", ELE_NEW, EDGE_MARK);
00216     BMO_op_exec(bm, &bmop);
00217     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &bmop, "geomout", BM_FACE|BM_EDGE, ELE_NEW);
00218     BMO_op_finish(bm, &bmop);
00219     
00220     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "geomout", BM_EDGE|BM_FACE, ELE_NEW);
00221 }
